Pickups will happen at two locations--McHenry Middle School (2120 Lincoln Rd. McHenry, IL 60051) and Parkland School (1802 N. Ringwood Rd. McHenry, IL 60050).

Pickups for the coming week will be on Monday and Wednesday between the hours of 10:00 am to 12:00 pm. You will receive enough breakfasts and lunches for two days on Monday and three days on Wednesday for any child under the age of 18. If you would like to receive meals during these times, please go to either McHenry Middle School or Parkland School on these dates and times and let the staff know how many children you need meals for when you arrive. Meals will be delivered to you in sacks to your car.

Additional community resources for food can be found here: https://www.foodpantries.org/ci/il-mchenry

Camp Invention will return to McHenry the week of June 15, 2020 to a new location, Riverwood Elementary School. Visit www.invent.org for more information.
